Scripts.OnLoad:
Mixin(self, BattlePassSplashArtworkBase243Mixin) self:OnLoad()
self.Artwork:SetAtlas("Custom-Splash-BattlePass-2025-1", true) self.Artwork:SetSubTexCoord(0, 1, 0.12, 1.12)
self.ModelPanel.ActionButton:SetNormalAtlas("Custom-Splash-BattlePass-2025-1-Assets-Button", true) self.ModelPanel.ActionButton:SetPushedAtlas("Custom-Splash-BattlePass-2025-1-Assets-Button-Pressed", true)
